lead_paragraph: Wilfried Zaha was named on Wednesday by the Ivory Coast in a 24-man preliminary squad for the African Nations Cup finals, days after meeting England manager Gareth Southgate about his international future.

headline.print_headline: Zaha Named by Ivory Coast in Nations Cup Squad
headline.main: Zaha Named by Ivory Coast in Nations Cup Squad

snippet: Wilfried Zaha was named on Wednesday by the Ivory Coast in a 24-man preliminary squad for the African Nations Cup finals, days after meeting England manager Gareth Southgate about his international future....
